imdb.title: Inu x Boku SS
imdb.plot: A socially inept girl, Ririchiyo, seeks seclusion from others to attempt to improve herself and hence moves to a building that is rumoured to house the rich and powerful, when in fact it is meant for people with supernatural ances...

episodes.title: Dog and Me
episodes.plot: Maison de Ayakashi is an exclusive apartment complex; each tenant gets their own bodyguard. Ririchiyo has finally convinced her parents to let her live alone, but when Soushi introduces himself as her bodyguard, she will try everything in her power to drive him off.

episodes.title: A Lonely Dog
episodes.plot: Ririchiyo is out shopping with Sorinozuka, whose goal is to keep her out the complex until 6. When they return, Karuta has suddenly gone missing...

episodes.title: The Real Contract
episodes.plot: After dealing with making a good first impression at school, Ririchiyo notices Soushi turning a girl down. After asking him about it, her emotions get the best of her.

episodes.title: Ayakashi Kan Walk Rally
episodes.plot: Watanuki has returned from training with his SS, Natsume. Watanuki, Natsume, and Souishi have known each other since childhood, and Natsume hints that he knows about Soushi's past.

episodes.title: Kagerou of the Spring
episodes.plot: Ririchiyo has been getting strange text messages from an unknown number. Though she shrugs them off, the messages are starting to become more frequent...and threatening.

episodes.title: Don't Think Don't Think
episodes.plot: Roromiya spends a lot of time in her own world, oblivious to everything else. Watanuki believes people just don't get her. Ririchiyo, meanwhile, wants to get closer to her but isn't sure how.

episodes.title: Their Night Alone
episodes.plot: A ghost has invaded the mansion, activating its security system. Nobara, Sorinozuka, and Chino are locked in the cafeteria, Watanuki and Natsume in the hallway, while Ririchiyo and Miketsukami are locked in her room. This is the perfect time for Ririchiyo to express her feelings...but will she?

episodes.title: Tea and Distance
episodes.plot: Ririchiyo wants the type of friendship the others share with their SS. But her inability to speak her true feelings doesn't help. What can she do to break the barrier of Master / Servant between them?

episodes.title: The Day of the Promise
episodes.plot: A series of commands have appeared in the mansion. But that means nothing to Ririchiyo as she frets over her upcoming tea date with Miketsukami.

episodes.title: The Unfaithful Dog
episodes.plot: Tea time has gone sour with Kageru's sudden arrival surprising both Ririchiyo and Miketsukami. Kageru has come to pick her up to give her an important message.

episodes.title: Kageru
episodes.plot: Miketsukami's history has been exposed. A Child born with youaki blood is a reason for celebration, but in his family, things are very different.

episodes.title: The Day We Came Together
episodes.plot: The residents are burying a time capsule for their future selves. Ririchiyo has accidentally put the wrong letter inside the capsule and given a very personal one to Miketsukami.
